    • About Andy Richardson


    Andy is a Licensed NC Real Estate Broker, Certified Home Selling Advisor and experienced Real Estate Investor. Originally from Monroe, NC, Andy relocated to Wilmington in 1998 where he attended UNC-Wilmington. After graduating, he chose to make Real Estate his profession of choice.

    With over 12 years of experience in Residential and Commercial Real Estate Sales, Leases and Investments and hundreds of successful transactions, Andy knows and understands every aspect of the Real Estate Business. He is dedicated to providing excellent customer service and promises to bring a fun and professional attitude while helping his clients achieve their Real Estate goals and needs.
